alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 06 at 2:21AM MDT until October 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...In Iowa, Lyon County. In Minnesota, Pipestone and Rock Counties. In South Dakota, Minnehaha, Hutchinson, Turner and Lincoln Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
